review.comment: Excellent service!! Very knowledgeable!! She taught me how to take better care of my skin. I want to come back for other services like massages, Lazer etc. So happy a day spa has come to Lexington.
What a wonderfully beautiful spa right here in Lexington! Great job Gigi!

review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review! We enjoyed having you for a day at our spa!!

review.comment: I had such a lovely and transformative experience With Gigi at Enhance!    I absolutely loved everything about it there, and cannot wait to go back!
review.review_reply: Thank you Anne, we appreciate your sweet review!!! So glad to hear you had such positive results with your facial!! Look forward to seeing you again!💖

review.comment: This place is amazing! We will definitely be back. Gigi gave the most wonderful facial and Lindsey gave the best massage I’ve ever had. Highly recommend this place for all your spa needs!
review.review_reply: Thank you Lisa for such a great review!! We loved having you and your husband here to celebrate your birthday with us and appreciate the recommendation! We look forward to seeing you both again!!

review.comment:
Absolutely wonderful experience!  Gigi went out of her way to ensure my bestie and I could experience this beautiful place while my bestie was traveling from Kansas. We both had facials and massages. This was my best friends first facial and massage and now she wants to move to the state just to continue coming to Enhance Image! I have already booked my next appointment and plan to continue going. Lindsey our massage therapist was also amazing. I have had several massages over the last few years and she was the best by far!

Thank you for the amazingly needed relaxation!

If your hesitant about booking your “me time”, DON’T! Make the call now. I promise you won’t regret it.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Erica! We are touched that you and your Bestie had a memorable getaway with  us!!! Excited to hear about your Bestie’s experience & hope she moves here too!!:) look forward to seeing you you soon!!

review.comment: I apologize this review is far overdue but truly deserved.  I had the good fortune 2 weeks ago to spend my day at Enhance Image.  Gigi, the owner, has created a masterpiece.  The atmosphere is welcoming, peaceful, tranquil.   The staff is friendly, professional and knowledgeable.  There is no stone left unturned here.  In a world full of crazy, this place was the wonderful respite I needed to recharge and rejuvenate.  All of the services I had were terrific, but my favorite was the customized facial -- it was amazing !    I encourage everyone who needs a little time for themselves, to try Enhance Image.   You will be well cared for.   I look forward to my next visit !
review.review_reply: Thank you for such a sweet review Denise!! We are thrilled to hear that you had such a memorable experience and appreciate the time you took to share your kindness with us!! We look forward to pampering you again soon!!

review.comment: I have to say I've been terrible at neglecting my skin, but when I hit 51, I made an appointment to have a MicroDermabrasion procedure at Enhance Image to see if some of my aging skin could be removed. Upon my arrival, Gigi gave me a tour of her whole facility and I was impressed with how clean and lush everything is. I loved the feel and smell of all of the products she used, and all of the special comforts (like slippers and cover-ups) make you feel like a VIP. But more importantly, I was immediately elated when I actually saw my face glowing; real and beautiful results. I had a chiropractor appointment afterwards, and the first thing she said to me was "your face is glowing"! I would definitely recommend this procedure and Enhance Image!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Angela! We appreciate the kind review and for taking the time to share how this experience made you feel. Excited to hear how others could also see your "Glow" afterwards!!! Look forward to seeing you soon and keep the glow going!! :)

review.comment: Had a great first experience today for my derma facial ! Such a wonderful atmosphere and great customer service! Very professional and just a great experience! Definitely will be continuing business here.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Devin! We appreciate the great review and thrilled that you had a wonderful experience with us and looking forward to seeing you soon!! 💖😁

review.comment: Highly recommend!  A great facial!! Thank you.
review.review_reply: Thank you Kathi!! Look forward to seeing you next month!! :)

review.comment:
Enjoyed my time at enchance image. Very relaxing
My skin was glowing for 2 weeks.  Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much  April! We are excited to hear you were Glowing for 2 weeks!! Hope to see you the next time when your in town!!

review.comment: Enhance Image was an absolute pleasure! My wife made the appointment for us in celebration of our anniversary. I am not one to make a special effort to book a day spa experience. But, I was so thankful my wife did!  It was a calming and relaxing environment. We started with a brief tour of the spa and its services. The entire spa was very clean.We enjoyed a hydrotherapy bath followed by a massage. You never know how much you needed this til you do it! Thoroughly enjoyed the day!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the kind review! We were excited that you could celebrate your Anniversary with us and we were able to made it a memorable experience!! :)

review.comment: Amazing... My hubby treated me! Make sure you have the rest of the day off, to go home and relax! GiGi did the facial and another young lady did my massage, Heaven! They didn't make me feel rush like it was just a service but it felt like they really wanted to serve me! Oh the place is beautiful hands down!
review.review_reply: We are so happy to hear your experience with your facial and massage was a heavenly one!!! Thank you Kellie, for the sweet review and for your hubby, getting you a gift card to relax!!! :)

review.comment:
Lindsey has given me 3 massages! Fabulous! Helps my “worn out” body to move so much better! I highly recommend
Enhanced Image!
review.review_reply: We are happy that your massages has made a difference with Lindsay!! She is awesome and we are thankful for your kind review Cindy!!

review.comment: AMAZING facial by Gigi!!!! This space is beautiful. I called requesting a last minute facial, Gigi got me right in. Upon arrival she greeted me, offered me multiple beverages, gave me a tour and settled me in the esthetics room. She relaxed me with breathing exercises before giving me the best facial I’ve ever had. She was so informative and sweet too. I booked my next appointment before I left to ensure I wouldn’t forget to have this service done again. Make your appointment today, you will be glad you did.
review.review_reply: We are so excited to hear that your experience with Gigi was relaxing and your facial was memorable!!! Thank you Rachel for such a sweet review and look forward to seeing you soon!!!

review.comment: I just discovered this day spa which opened in August 2020. It's beautiful and clean with private rooms for each service they offer. The VIP lounge is warm and comfortable for waiting for your next service. Today I had a pedicure and Gigi was so delightful to chat with. I know that I will return and look forward to trying a facial or massage soon.
review.review_reply: Thank you Cindy for your kind review and glad your experience with us was enjoyable and look forward to your next visit!!

review.comment: Enhance Image is an amazing experience. From the moment you step foot in the door you know you are going to be taken care of. All of the staff including GiGi and Lindsey went out of their way to make sure the experience exceeded our expectations. They want their clients to feel beautiful and cared for and they make sure that happens. They listen to your concerns and do all they can to meet your needs. Gigi did an amazing job on my facial and made my skin feel better than it has in years. Lindsey got my sore and tense muscles more relaxed than I have been since before COVID!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for such a raving review and so glad you both could come enjoy your spa package with us! Lindsay is amazing and glad we exceeded your expectations!! Look forward to seeing you again! :)

review.comment: Amazing experience!   Calming environment!   Super positive energy vibe, super professional!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Wendy for such a positive review!! Look forward to seeing you soon!:)

review.comment: This was my first experience with a massage and it was fantastic.  Lindsey made me feel like a million bucks.  Gigi did a phenomenal job on my brows and my pedicure was amazing.  This spa is beautiful and I highly recommend them.  I can't wait to go back. I'm even thinking about planning a couples massage with my husband.  Their prices are incredibly reasonable and you'll leave feeling amazing.
review.review_reply: Serra we are thrilled that we could make your experience a fantastic one! Thank you for your kind review and look forward to having you and husband for a date at our spa! :)

review.comment: Such a beautiful facility!   Gigi is very friendly and informative about the services. She takes her time and explains the products she’s using.   If you’re looking for relaxation, she has it covered!  I didn’t want my facial to end!  My skin has never felt better.
review.review_reply: Thank you Jennifer for your sweet review!! We are so happy that your facial and visit was a memorable one! Look forward to having you and your daughter back!

review.comment: Very pleased with the services I received at Enhance.  Beautiful, full-service spa.  Very professional.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind review Caroline! We were so happy to have you and your friends share a day with us!!
Thank you so much April for the 5 star review! We look forward to seeing you soon!!
Thank you Dian! We appreciate your review and look forward to your next visit!
Thank you for your review, it was a pleasure!!

review.comment: Enhance Image is very clean and welcoming. The quality of their services are unmatched! I heard great things about this salon for a while and finally decided to go and treat myself. I received the Spa Deluxe Package and it was everything AND MORE than what I expected. Their staff went above and beyond to make my first time to the spa as enjoyable as possible. I left the salon feeling so relaxed and totally rejuvenated. I will be back! 🧖🏼‍♀️💆🏼‍♀️💅🏼
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Rachel for the great review!! It was our pleasure serving you and that we able to meet your expectations!  We look forward to serving you in the near future!! :)

review.comment: Today, I had my first facial EVER!  I have 5 year old twins and just recently left a job that had me super stressed 24/7 for 6 years.  I recently promised myself that I would start doing more for ME! I’ve had the worst adult acne for the past 5 years and have tons of scars from it. I was always hesitant about facials because of how bad my skin is.  Gigi not only gave me some of the most relaxing and luxurious moments of my life, but she talked me through each step and went above and beyond to make sure that she was really doing what was best for my skin!  I can’t wait to see how I look after she’s done with me!  I know it will be a long journey, but I wouldn’t trust anyone else to take on this journey with me!  My face feels and looks AMAZING!  Not to mention, it’s a totally Covid-friendly space!  What more can you ask for?
review.review_reply: Lauren it was my honor to do you first facial and for your sweet review!! Thank you so much for allowing me to treat your skin and looking forward to your progress! We will strive to continue to make your every visit memorable and relaxing!!!

review.comment: Omg...I can't believe a place like this exists in Lexington. This spa is SO BEAUTIFUL and I don't have the words to explain how absolutely warm and welcoming everyone is!! I immediately felt more than comfortable being here. My mom and I had the most incredible spa day a few weeks ago and we're still talking about it. I have troubled skin and after a facial with GiGi, I had good skin days for about a week straight. We also got massages and WOW we were totally blown away. Every little detail was thought of...total luxury.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind review Deanna! We are so happy to hear that your Mother and daughter Spa day was a memorable one and we could make you feel like the VIP's you both are!!!

review.comment: Very calming and relaxing. Beautiful peaceful atmosphere. Very courteous. Highly recommended.
review.review_reply: We appreciate your kind recommendations and thankful that your experience was peaceful and relaxing!!! :)

review.comment: I can’t say enough great things about this spa! It exceeded all expectations! Perfect location, amazing service, I mean high quality top notch! You really feel relaxed and beautiful when you leave as they offer sooo many options and packages. I highly recommend to anyone who just needs that serine atmosphere for a facial or massage or pedicure, options are endless. So happy I had the opportunity to experience this. Thank you so much GiGi, your all around amazing.
review.review_reply: Thank you Tricia, we are thrilled that we met all your expectations and appreciate the recommendations! Look forward to having you and your husband and enjoy more serenity together!! :)

review.comment: Enhance Image is the perfect treat, whether it's your first time treating yourself or you are a long time self-care enthusiast. Gigi is wonderful, kind, calming, and clearly an experienced esthetician; her knowledge of products and techniques really put me at ease with the microdermabrasion facial. I am looking forward to my next service and everything they have to offer. Additionally, GiGi was able to fit me in immediately so that I could experience the spa treatment on the spot. The facility is beautifully designed, very elegant and calming. This place is a true gem!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Amy, we appreciate you and your kind review! We look forward to seeing you back and hope you enjoy your youthful skin!! :)

review.comment: Me and my mom loved our separate experiences with Enhance Image!! I have never had a facial but GiGi did a great job with my face and I felt like a King when I was get my microdermabrasion with a facial! She did an awesome job and was very professional and really got to know us as clients!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Jeremy! We appreciate your support and it was my pleasure getting to know you and your Mom!

review.comment: This place is amazing!  Had an amazing massage  given by Rachel, who was so sweet. Gigi is the perfect hostess, who gave an amazing tour of the place.  I'm so excited for my upcoming facial with Gigi! I would totally recommend this place!
review.review_reply: We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience and appreciate the review!! Look forward to seeing you soon for your facial!!😍

review.comment: Had my husband get his feet done on short notice. Massage was awesome, very comfortable and they offer so much more. Gigi was very helpful and did a wonderful tour of the building. This is definitely my place of total relaxation from here on out.
review.review_reply: We were so happy to accommodate your husband and thrilled his first experience was an awesome one! Look forward to having to you both share this beautiful facility!! Your spa awaits you!!! :)

review.comment: This spa is beautiful! I had a wonderful experience and will definitely be back!
review.review_reply: Thank you Jo!! We are thrilled you had a wonderful visit and look forward to seeing you back soon!!😁

review.comment: I have been looking for a local spa to try and Enhance Image did not disappoint! The spa is absolutely beautiful and offers everything you could want! I had a massage with Rachel and it was amazing! I can't wait to return and try a facial - I will be back soon!
review.review_reply: Thanks Katie!  We are so glad you enjoyed your massage with Rachel! We look forward to seeing you soon!

review.comment: My husband bought me a gift card for a massage here and I upgraded it to a signature package for a massage and facial. Both services were absolutely amazing. The massage was very relaxing and helped me feel like I could finally release the tension in my shoulders. My facial left my skin absolutely glowing. The staff is great. Gigi is the sweetest and cleaned up my eyebrows for me during my facial and got them looking better than they have all year! The space is beautiful, clean, and very relaxing. So happy to have such a great spa space in Lexington! I would highly recommend this spa to any of my friends and family and will be returning myself!
review.review_reply: Ciera, we are so glad you enjoyed your signature package! Let your husband know we will have an amazing Black Friday deal coming up!

review.comment: What an amazing experience!! Just got home from a wonderful afternoon of pampering. I enjoyed a message and facial. The spa has a clean and relaxing atmosphere. Gi Gi is friendly and professional. I cannot wait to begin using my new skin care products. Enhance Image is a great addition to the Lexington community. I’m already looking forward to my next visit!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind review. We are so glad you enjoyed your visit! Come see us soon!

review.comment: Nice, clean and relaxing environment. Everyone is kind and professional. Taylor did a wonderful job with my laser hair removal.  I also scheduled a mani & pedi. Looking forward to going back!
review.review_reply: Tiffany, Thank you for your review! We are glad you enjoyed your visit! Can’t wait to see you at the spa again soon!

review.comment: Beautiful spa and best facial ever!    Wonderful experience and can’t wait to return!
review.review_reply: Renee, We are so glad you enjoyed your facial!  We love pampering our clients!

review.comment: This awesome practice has left nothing to chance and offers all that you could ever need to pamper yourself . The facility itself is AMAZINGLY beautiful and is absolutely on target following all state mandated safety precautions to not only be COVID compliant,  they  TRULY WANT to protect their patients AND the community!  I was just so thankful not to have to expose myself to multiple places, coordinating times and driving all over town. Ordinarily, I am very reluctant to post ratings and reviews, but gals, it has arrived... the opportunity to  get multiple aesthetic treatments such as facials, Botox, fillers, mani/ pedis and hair cuts, color, blowouts.... UNDER ONE ROOF ....ALL IN THE HEART OF LEXINGTON!!!  You will not be disappointed!
review.review_reply: Sam, Thank you for your kind review!  We are committed to delivering a safe, relaxing and clean environment for all of our clients because it’s important to  pamper yourself without worry!

review.comment: WOW! I just was blown away by my first visit to Enhanced Image. From the outside, it looked like a doctor’s office, but go inside and you will discover an ultra elegant spa. Now I go on cruise ships every year and one of my favorite cruise activities is to head to the spa for a facial. Well this spa rivals the cruise ships in elegance, ambiance, cleanliness and professional service. The owner, Gigi, was very welcoming and gave me a tour of their facility. Tip: Book 2 services and you get to use the VIP suite. I elected for a facial and l truly had the best facial ever! Never have I had such a custom facial designed specifically for my my skin type. Gigi was gentle and soothing while giving an absolutely incredible facial. Trust me, I have had many over the years and this was the best one yet! I will be back soon!
review.review_reply:
Carolyn
Thank you for such a lovely review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit with us and the VIP lounge.  Customizing a facial is what makes us different!  Everyone is unique just like our spa!

review.comment: I am delighted to share my wonderful experience at Enhance Image. After a warm welcome, I was invited to a tour of the facility. It has an elegant, professional atmosphere. ...Every two weeks I treat myself to a manicure and pedicure. A facial and a massage are also something that I enjoyed, this Spa will be able to take care of all my needs. It exceeded my expectations and left relaxed and pampered.
review.review_reply:
Erik
We are delighted you enjoyed your visit to Enhance Imagine. We look forward to seeing you soon!

review.comment: Quality, beauty, convenience and professionalism would be my first impression of Enhance Image. The efficiency of a Day Spa, Medical Spa and a full beauty Salon including, massage, hydrotherapy, mani/pedi, hair cut and style plus a full menu of laser treatments including injectables are all under one roof in a serene environment. You will enjoy your experience and I will be back often.
review.review_reply:
Phyllis
Thank you for your review.  We love our clients!! See you soon!

review.comment: awesome atmosphere, amazing staff!
review.review_reply:
Reid
We are so glad you like the spa! We hope to see you soon!

review.comment: “Sensuous spa with a beautifully serene experience.  Eager staff to help you relax, it meets your relaxation necessities and you’ll forget your not in the Napa Valley.”
review.review_reply: Todd, thank you for your review. We are so honored to have clients like you that appreciate the experience we create. And who needs Napa Valley anyways😀 you got us!

review.comment: You want to go to enhance and try everything they have to offer.   And ...the list is absolutely comprehensive with services that will relax you and beautify you too.   The space is beautiful and feels like you could just curl up and breathe in the spa atmosphere.  The owners worked incredibly hard to make sure that my experience would exceed my expectations in every way.  This place is a winner and I look forward to future visits.
review.review_reply: Heidi, thank you for your review. We are so glad you were able to visit with us and find some time to relax. We can’t wait to see you again soon☺️

review.comment: It’s great to finally have a place that offers it all under one roof!  I took a tour of the spa and the attention to detail and ambience exudes a high class experience!  The VIP lounge is very relaxing and I am thrilled to be able to get  a couples massage with my wife with the option for a hydrotherapy Spa experience!! My wife is also excited for all the laser treatments they offer! I’ve been to many Spas all over South Carolina and this is the nicest facility I have seen. Pictures don’t do this place justice you need to see this for yourself!
review.review_reply: We are so glad you love us as much as we love our clients!  We hope you and your wife will come relax with us again soon!

review.comment: Great first experience at Enhance Image. Certainly a treat that my wife and I will be back for again. Gigi was wonderfully hospitable and made us feel at home from the moment we walked in. All in all just a very professional, clean, and relaxing environment. It's the little things and attention to detail that make such a difference.
review.review_reply: Zach, we are so glad that you enjoyed your experience with us!  Thank you for noticing all of the little details that that ensure clients have a wonderful experience.  See you soon!

review.comment: Being  an esthetician myself, I could not help  but to critique my experience  from that point of view. Gigi‘s tone of voice was calming and self assured, she put me at ease. Her knowledge came through once she performed an absolutely flawless facial. I didn’t want it to end! From the warm towels that hugged my face to the fingertip massage! Amazing!
review.review_reply: Lisa Thank you for your review.  We think Gigi is amazing and we are so glad you agree!  Let us know when you are ready for some more pampering ❤️

review.comment: I had a beautiful experience at the new lexington Medical/Day Spa. I was very impressed with all the services including lazer services they offer. It was a wonderful experience and I will be coming back often!
review.review_reply: We are so glad you enjoyed your experience!  We appreciate your loyalty!
